name: Swapsicle
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Swapsicle is a decentralised exchange built on the avalanche blockchain offering swaps, farming and staking opportunities. 

Our DEX is built by the community and for the community meaning POPS holders are rewarded for using the platform.

POPS is a utility token that also rewards its holders with a share of exchange revenues.
